articles.author: Julia Mueller, The Hill
articles.title: Noem announces 10K migrant arrests in Minneapolis - NewsNation
articles.description: “We have arrested over 10,000 criminal illegal aliens who were killing Americans, hurting children and reigning terror in Minneapolis,” Noem wrote.
articles.content:
(The Hill) Homeland Security (DHS) Secretary Kristi Noem on Monday announced thousands of arrests in Minneapolis, Minn., as part of the administrations ongoing crackdown on immigration.
